entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL)

indices.name: index_professors_name
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_professors_name` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`name`)

entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `professorId` INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`professorId`) REFERENCES `professors`(`id`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

indices.name: index_students_name
indices.createSql: CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS `index_students_name` ON `${TABLE_NAME}` (`name`)
